value.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

value.title: Protect your virtual machine settings with Azure Automation State Configuration
value.excerpt: Learn how to protect your virtual machine settings with Azure Automation State Configuration

value.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure App Service to create a new ASP.NET-based web app, then publish and update directly from Visual Studio.

value.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

value.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.

value.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Learn how to run and troubleshoot containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances.

value.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll guide you through creating a WebJob in the same project as an existing Web App and automating tasks with WebJobs.

value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: The Principles of Sustainable Software Engineering
value.excerpt: Sustainable Software Engineering is an emerging discipline at the intersection of climate science, software, hardware, electricity markets, and data center design. The Principles of Sustainable Software Engineering are a core set of competencies needed to define, build, and run sustainable software applications.

value.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data
value.excerpt: Use unsupervised learning methods to predict groupings in data. Use variations of k-means clustering and spectral clustering to analyze and visualize difficult data sets.

images.title: Use unsupervised learning to analyze unlabeled data

value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01

value.title: Azure Event Hubs for Apache Kafka | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Shubha Vijayasarathy joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Event Hubs, which makes data ingestion simple, secure, and scalable. As a distributed streaming platform, Event Hubs enables you to stream your data from any source—storing and processing millions of events per second— so you can build dynamic

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Cosmos DB with Scott Hanselman
value.excerpt: Kirill Gavrylyuk stops by Azure Friday to talk Cosmos DB with Scott Hanselman. Watch quick overview of the industry's first globally distributed multi-model database service followed by a demo of moving an existing MongoDB app to Cosmos DB with a single config change.  For more information, see: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/cosmos-db/.

value.title: Continuous integration and deployment using Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can follow industry-leading best practices to do continuous integration and deployment for your Extract Transform/Load (ETL) and Extract Load/Transform (ELT) workflows to multiple environments such as Dev, Test, Prod, and more. value.excerpt: Azure App Configuration is a service that enables you to centralize your application configuration.
